title: Frequently Asked Questions
subtitle: Answers to your questions about our watermark removal tool

q1.question: Is this tool completely free?
q1.answer: Yes, our watermark removal tool is completely free to use, no registration or subscription required.

q2.question: What image formats are supported?
q2.answer: We support common image formats including JPG, PNG, JPEG, WebP, and more.

q3.question: Will the image quality decrease after processing?
q3.answer: We use advanced image processing algorithms to maintain original quality as much as possible. The quality depends on the complexity and location of the watermark.

q4.question: Will my images be saved or shared?
q4.answer: No. All image processing is done locally in your browser. We do not save, store, or share your images.

q5.question: Is there a file size limit?
q5.answer: To ensure optimal performance, we recommend uploading images no larger than 10MB.

q6.question: How to get the best results?
q6.answer: Carefully mark the watermark area to ensure complete coverage. For complex backgrounds, you may process multiple times for better results.

q7.question: Can I use it on mobile devices?
q7.answer: Yes! Our tool works on mobile device browsers, so you can use it anytime, anywhere.

q8.question: What should I do if I encounter problems?
q8.answer: If you encounter any issues, please contact us through the contact page, and we'll resolve them as soon as possible.
